message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I believe this offer benefits us both.
Alice, your offer was a bit too generous towards yourself. Let's be realistic. This is my counter-offer.
Bob, time is literally money in this game. I'm proposing a slightly better split for me this time. Let's settle this before inflation eats away at our potential gains.
Alice, this back and forth isn't very productive. I need you to understand the urgency of the situation with the inflation.  This is my final offer.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. I'm proposing a 50/50 split. This is the fairest option and ensures we both walk away with something substantial.
